page.title: 08HOUSEHOLD APPLIANCES
page.content: Becky and Angela did a survey on home appliances.Out of 54 people...... 53 had washing machines 35 had tumble dryers 6 had dishwashers 54 had vacuum cleaners This survey 54 had fridges shows that 49 had freezers each of the 16 had microwaves appliances 31 had food processors used in 49 had electric kettles every-day 39 had toasters life are 50 had telephones owned by at 51 had televisions least 6 familes. 28 had computers 28 had video recorders 45 had stereos 43 had central heating 23 had electric blankets 39 had showers 53 had hairdryers
